briefTitle: A Study of Tapentadol Immediate-Release in the Treatment of Patients With Acute Pain From Bunionectomy
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tapentadol Immediate-Release Formulation in the Treatment of Acute Pain From Bunionectomy; Bridging Study for Korea
summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the efficacy of at least 1 dose of tapentadol IR 50 mg and/or 75 mg versus placebo using the sum of pain intensity difference at 48 hours (SPID48) to measure analgesic effect in Korean patients with acute pain following bunionectomy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Sum of Pain Intensity Differences (SPID) Over 48 Hours
